name: Udder Madness
description:
Have you ever wanted to go wild, like a bull in a china shop?! Well here is your chance!! Run around the arena, bump, spin and charge into people to build your points and return to your mother. Try playing on browser or download to try!
  • A and D for Left and right (YOU'RE OUT OF CONTROL! YOU CAN ONLY GO FORWARDS!!!)
  • Spacebar to spin
  • CTRL to Charge
